canContribute(uint256).details: Check if fund can accept contributions

claimAccess(uint256).details: Claim access to purchased resource (contributor only)

distributeAccess(uint256,string).details: Distribute access information to contributors (organizer only)

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Emergency withdraw for stuck funds (owner only)

finalizeFund(uint256).details: Finalize fund and release funds to organizer (organizer only)

getFundContributors(uint256).details: Get all contributors for a fund

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userHasContributed(uint256,address).details: Check if user has contributed to fund
